quotes.quote: Big head, target for enemy; big heart, target for friend.
If you let your head get too big, it'll break your neck.
Bigheadedness is usually a symptom of small-mindedness.
Who hasn't had a weight issue? If not the body, certainly the big head!
He had a big head and a face so ugly it became almost fascinating.
Don't try to be like somebody else. You'll be miserable. You need to be yourself, and don't ever get a big head.
I have a big head, so I can appreciate a good hat.
Small-mindedness is intensified by things such as big-headedness.
Be yourself, fill your life with good people, and don't get a big head. It can all be gone tomorrow.
The only way to get through the life I had was just to have a big head of steam and determination.
The Elephant Man claimed his head was big because, it's so full of dreams. Actually, it's because his skull was shaped like a turkey.
The big show is inside my head.
It's all in your head -- you just have no idea how big your head is.
I'm not allowed to get a big head, I've still got to do the simple things in life.
I'm impressed, I've never met such a small mind inside such a big head before.
